Tiering all 32 NFL teams by their playoff chances: Where do Packers, Colts, Raiders, Cowboys and Seahawks land?
item.description: We put all 32 NFL teams into tiers based on their likelihood of making the postseason, from the Super Bowl favorites to the top draft pick candidates.

item.title: Legendary NBA player, coach Wilkens dies at 88
item.description: Lenny Wilkens, a smooth playmaker who was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame as both a player and a coach, has died. He was 88.

item.title: Guardians' Clase, Ortiz indicted for pitch rigging
item.description: Cleveland Guardians pitchers Emmanuel Clase and Luis Ortiz have been indicted on a host of charges related to an alleged scheme to rig bets on pitches...
